HERO.DESCRIPTION: We enhance your business efficiency with sustainable AI-driven solutions to support the digital economy ecosystem.

INFO_SECTION.SUBTITLE: At RQM, we aspire to build
INFO_SECTION.TITLE: Services that shape the future
INFO_SECTION.CARD_CYBER_DESC: We offer advanced cybersecurity services including vulnerability testing and scanning, and security assessment for systems and applications using the latest technologies. We work on risk analysis and vulnerability identification, providing practical solutions to address them. We also provide integrated cyber infrastructure ensuring continuous protection and enhancing corporate readiness against digital threats.
INFO_SECTION.CARD_AI_DESC: We use integrated AI technologies to develop AI agents, machine learning applications, and business automation. We also work on improving natural language processing, big data analysis, and providing integrated technical infrastructure ensuring sustainability and success of solutions.
INFO_SECTION.CARD_DIGITAL_DESC: We build integrated digital solutions with our clients, including custom software development, business applications, and integration tools. We work on building and studying user interfaces and experience to improve interaction with systems. We also provide integrated technical infrastructure ensuring sustainability and success of solutions.

TRANSFORMATION.TITLE: Transforming your project into reality
TRANSFORMATION.SUBTITLE: Systematic steps supported by experience and skill to achieve your goals
TRANSFORMATION.CARD_ANALYSIS_DESC: We analyze business requirements with agile methodologies.
TRANSFORMATION.CARD_STUDY_DESC: We research, study, and test the feasibility of the work.
TRANSFORMATION.CARD_BUILD_DESC: We establish the project and build its initial business model.

PROCESS.CARD_SUSTAINABILITY_DESC: We maintain the sustainability of business efficiency and growth.
PROCESS.CARD_ANALYSIS_DESC: We wrap our work in transparency and prioritize ethical standards.
PROCESS.CARD_PERFECTION_DESC: We pay attention to work details to meet client needs.
PROCESS.CARD_COMMITMENT_DESC: We measure our steps precisely and pledge our responsibility towards the client.

VALUES_CARD.TITLE: Our High Values
VALUES_CARD.DESCRIPTION: These values represent the cornerstone of all our work with partners

PRODUCTS.TITLE: Our Products
PRODUCTS.CARD_QAYD_DESCRIPTION: Manage your business with innovative technologies to enhance the efficiency of legal and administrative work in one platform, saving time, reducing costs, and boosting client confidence.
PRODUCTS.CARD_QAYD_FEATURE_2: Accurate details for each case and its records.
PRODUCTS.CARD_QAYD_FEATURE_3: Automatic organization of court session dates
PRODUCTS.CARD_SMART_GATEWAY_TITLE: Your Smart Gateway for Digital Investment
PRODUCTS.CARD_SMART_GATEWAY_DESCRIPTION: An integrated platform that provides AI tools and solutions for institutions and companies in the financial and investment services sector.
